content.prompt: In the passage, which of the following outcomes do lines 4-5 (namque...bellum) suggest will occur?

choices.label: Laviniaâ€™s people will be well-known but not because of war.
Lavinia will be famous, but there will be war for her people.
Lavinia will predict victory for her people, but it will not come true.
Lavinia will become a famous leader, but she will lead a different people.

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
